title: oruvarum ariyAdu
sahitya:
oruvarum ariyAdu pala vinai shUzhndEnenru uLLam magizhndirundEn unnai marandEn


anupallavi

  oruvarum ariyAmal uLLam amarndirukkum arumarai mudlvanE Anandak-kUttanE


caraNam 1    porumaiyin kunrenap-pOTrum shAnrOrgaLum variyanEn koDu marma vAzhvu kaNDAl munivar 
karuNai shEr vAriyE kAindu nI veghuLvAyO aruLinAl annai pOl anjalenraNaippAyO
    caraNam 2    shei kurai evarukkum terindiDAdenrumE mei kurai vAzhkkaiyEn migha manam pUrittEn 
pArttiruppAn oruvan pArkkappaDAda tiru mUrtikku badil enna mozhivadenrunnAmal
